original_text: The Ammonites paid tribute to Uzziah, and his fame spread even to the border of Egypt, for he became very strong.
korean_text: 암몬 사람들이 웃시야에게 조공을 바치매 웃시야가 매우 강성하여 이름이 애굽 변방까지 퍼졌더라

sentences.original_text: The Ammonites paid tribute to Uzziah
and his fame spread even to the border of Egypt
